tasks:
  default:

  ml:
    dir: bucket/
    deps: [build-make-scoop-manifest]
    cmds:
      - make-scoop-manifest -D -g goark/depm > ml.json
    generates:
      - ml.json

  build-make-scoop-manifest:
    desc: Build make-scoop-manifest command.
    run: once
    cmds:
      - go install github.com/hymkor/make-scoop-manifest@latest
